page.title: 01 GAZETEER
page.content: Our area is mainly residential pre_war,post_war ,and Council homes.It is well served by the M53 and railways to Liverpool, Cheshire and North Wales Non_residential uses include docks and recreation. The largest open area is a steep ridge of woods and common which has places of scientific and of historical interest. There is interest in Conservation of our environment, a love of sports,and voluntary help for those in our Community who have handicaps. We are deeply concerned by social and economic . problems of drug taking and massive unemployment ,especially for the young. This block covers suburban estates part of the old inner city,and part of the CBD.
